miniapp.name: Drift
miniapp.subtitle: Drag your mood into color each day.
miniapp.description: Drift is a tiny mood canvas where you drag a dot on a living gradient to mark how you feel today, with yesterday’s mood softly ghosted behind.
miniapp.ogDescription: Drift is a tiny mood canvas where you drag a dot on a living gradient to mark how you feel today, with yesterday’s mood softly ghosted behind.
